column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " You ratted me out to the President ? "
#Text=Mako says : " Korra , let me explain . "
#Text=Korra says : " Explain why my boyfriend stabbed me in the back ? "
#Text=Mako says : " Look , the President of the Republic asked me a direct question .
#Text=" Mako says : " Enough !
#Text=Look , I have a job to do !
#Text=I ca n't constantly be worrying about keeping you from making another huge mistake !
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , I have a job to do too , only it seems like you 're always standing in the way of me getting it done !
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , I guess if we 're both putting our jobs first , maybe there 's no room for our relationship !
#Text=" Korra says : " So , what ?
#Text=Are you breaking up with me ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah .
#Text=I guess I am .
#Text=" Lin says : " What the flameo happened here ?!
#Text=" Mako says : " I broke up with the Avatar .
#Text=" Lin says : " You got off easy .
#Text=You shoulda seen Air Temple Island after Tenzin broke up with me !
#Text="
